description: Increase the damage of $target by $amount% for each adjacent Champion
Increases the damage of Champions in the same column as $source by $(amount)%
Increases the damage of Champions next to $source by $(amount)%
Heals Champions in the column in front of $source for $(amount) every second
Increases the damage of Champions in the column behind $source by $(amount)%
Increases the damage of all Champions by $(amount)% for each enemy attacking $source.
Increases the damage of $source by $(amount)% if there is nobody directly in front of them.
Increases the damage of $source by $(amount)% if there are no Dwarves adjacent to them.
Increases the damage of Champions in the column in front of $source by $(amount)%
Grants $(amount) temporary hit-points to damaged Champions within 2 slots of $source.
Increases the damage of Human Champions by $(amount)%.
Increases the damage of Elven and Dwarven Champions by $(amount)%.
Increases the damage of Tiefling, Firbolg, and Dragonborn Champions by $(amount)%.
Increases damage done to Humanoid enemies by $(amount)%.
Increases damage done to Bestial enemies by $(amount)%.
Increases damage done to Undead enemies by $(amount)%.
Increases damage done to Fey enemies by $(amount)%.
Increases damage done to Monstrosity enemies by $(amount)%.
Increase the damage of Champions not adjacent to $source by $(amount)%
Increase the damage of all Champions by $(amount)%, minus $reduce% for each Champion adjacent to $source.
Transform into a bear and gain $(amount) health points.
Heals Champions adjacent to $source for $(amount) every second.
Reduce damage taken by $source by $(amount). Cannot reduce to below 5% of initial damage.
Increases the damage of all Champions by $amount%
Increases the damage of $source by $amount% if there are at least 3 unique Races adjacent to them
Increases the damage of $source by $amount% if they are in the Front row of the formation
Increases the Health of $source by $amount, and provides self-Heal of $amount___2 every second if $source's Health is below $limit___2%
Increases the Health of $source by $amount% if there are 2 Champions in the Column behind them
Increases the damage of $source by $amount%, but $source also takes $amount___2% more damage
Disables $target's Damage and Upgrades
Adds the Thunderclap cantrip to Krond's Base Attack, causing his attacks to deal additional AOE damage to all nearby enemies.
Increase the damage of Champions by $amount% if their charisma score is higher than 13.
Enemies attacked by $target drop $amount% extra gold when killed.
Enemies attacked by $target take $amount% extra damage for the next 5 seconds.
Adds a thrown Dagger to Hitch's Base Attack
Adds the Shocking Grasp cantrip to Krond's Base Attack, causing his attacks to deal additional damage to his primary target.
Adds the Fire Bolt cantrip to Krond's Base Attack, causing his attacks to deal additional damage to three random enemies.
Enemies that Krond damages will take additional damage from his Cantrip spells.
$target's Attack timer is slowed by $amount% until your next Attack
NOT USED, OVERWRITTEN BY champion_death_stacks_effect. REPORT IF SEEN!
Decreases the damage of $target by $amount%

Increases the damage of all Champions in proportion to their age: Champions get a $amount% increase, reduced by $reduce% for every $every_years years old they are over age $(start_years) (to a minimum of $min%)
$target gains Stoneskin and takes half damage from all ranged attacks.
$target casts Sleet Storm when they attack. The target enemy, and all nearby enemies, are slowed by half and their attack timers are doubled.
Gromma now casts Melf's Acid Arrow as her primary attack.
NOT USED
Enemies affected by Sleet Storm take $amount% additional damage
Melf's Acid Arrow now does $amount% of its damage as splash damage to nearby enemies.
$target is slowed by $amount%, and has their attack speed reduced by $(amount___2)%
$target's damage is increased by $amount%, and their Base Attack cooldown is reduced by $(amount___2) seconds
Decreases the Base Attack cooldown of Champions on the edge of the formation by $amount seconds
Increases the damage of Female Champions by $amount%
Increases the damage of Male Champions by $amount%
Increases the damage of Champions in the rearmost column of the formation by $amount%
Increases the damage of Champions within 2 slots distance of Dhadius (as the crow flies) by $amount% if their Intelligence stat is 14 or higher.
Increases the damage of Chromatic Orbs by $amount% each time the same element is cast in a row. This effect stacks each time the same element is cast.
Chromatic orbs now do AOE damage.
$target does between $min_amount% and $amount% bonus $damage_type damage to enemies they attack
Enemies damaged by $source have a $amount% chance to miss their next attack
For each other member of the Companions of the Hall in the formation, $target's damage is increased by $amount% (and the damage of all Champions is increased by half that, $(amount___2)%)

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the Damage of $target by $amount% for every other Champion of the Hall in the formation
Increases the Damage of $target by $amount% for every Champion of the Hall in the formation other than $source_hero

description: Drizzt now deals AOE damage to a medium radius around his primary target
Increase the number of targets attacked by Drizzt to 3

Heals all Champions in $source's column for $amount health every second
After $source attacks, their next Healing Word will grant temporary hit-points instead of healing

$(upgrade_name id) will grant temporary hit-points instead of healing

Doubles the effect of $(upgrade_name upgrade_id) on all "Neutral" Champions
Doubles the effect of $(upgrade_name upgrade_id) on all "Evil" Champions
Any Champion that is adjacent to more than 1 other Champion has their damage reduced to 0
When the two Champions that drank the Love Potion are adjacent, they each have their Damage increased by $amount%, and they each increase global Damage by $(amount___2)%

So we can display an overlay when Love Potion is off
Every 30 seconds, 3 heavy packages are randomly given to a Champion in the formation. Champions carrying a package can't use their Formation Abilities.
Every attack, Champions have a $chance% chance to step in the swamp and "wet feet", reducing their base attack speed by $amount% for 3 attacks

Crashing Waves prevent $target from doing any damage

Increases the damage of all Champions by $amount% for each ally in the formation that is dead (stacks additively)

Add a wide aoe cleave to every 3rd normal attack
Deal $amount% more damage with every 2nd normal attack

Reduces $target's damage by $amount%

Every $on_timer seconds, reduces the Damage of a random Champion to 0 for $for_time seconds

Increases the damage of Gnome and Halfling Champions by $(amount)%.

$source deals additional damage to enemies the farther they are from the formation: starting at 0% when they are $start_percent% from away from the formation, up to $amount% more damage when they are at the spawn point
When $source hits an enemy, they take $amount% more damage from all Champions for $seconds seconds. During this time, if they get hit $hits times, they will be stunned for $stun_time seconds
